title: Speak Out Against the Muslim Ban
description: Call your representative and senators to encourage them to speak out against the Muslim Ban

scripts.text: Friday, Trump signed an executive order barring citizens of seven predominantly Muslim countries from entering the U.S. As a result, green card holders and holders of valid visas were detained at airports across the country. As a constituent, I want [repName] to do everything in <his/her> power to fight for the rights of immigrants, who make our nation great. I expect <him/her> to join the public outcry and make it clear to the Trump Administration that <he/she> will not participate in legislating or approving funding for an extremist and xenophobic agenda. How is [repName] going to stand up to this unconstitutional order and other attempts to violate immigrants' rights?
I'm [name], asking [repName] to speak out against the Muslim Ban
Please speak out and do everything in your power to stop the Muslim Ban
